name: Grilled Salmon Salad
instructions: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
Brush the salmon fillet with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
Grill the salmon for 4-5 minutes on each side, or until cooked through.
Remove the salmon from the grill and let it rest for a few minutes.
In a large bowl, combine mixed greens, halved cherry tomatoes, sliced cucumber, and thinly sliced red onion.
Flake the salmon into bite-sized pieces and add it to the salad.
Sprinkle feta cheese over the top.
Drizzle with balsamic vinaigrette and toss gently to combine.
description: A healthy and nutritious grilled salmon salad featuring fresh mixed greens, crunchy vegetables, and a touch of feta cheese, all topped with a light balsamic vinaigrette. Perfect for a refreshing and protein-packed meal.
additional_notes: For added flavor, marinate the salmon in lemon juice and herbs before grilling. You can also substitute the feta cheese with goat cheese or omit the cheese altogether for a dairy-free option.
